name: Mag Projector, Basic (BMPj-11)
description: Basic version of the mag projector. The mag projector projects a high frequency magnetic effect onto the target. This rapid magnetic pulsing scrambles electronic circuits and induces temporary disorientation in organic beings. In addition, this weapon effect shuts down magnetic equipment.

sources.publication: Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 1 : Characters and Combat
Traveller 5.10 Core Rules Book 3 : Worlds and Adventures
